title: Veil of Seduction
description: [Siren Classic: Erotic Paranormal Romance, vampires, HEA]A newborn vampire. A powerful leader. An inconsolable woman. The shaping of their eternity all lies within the eyes.Steffan Matthews is the devastatingly handsome vampire leader of Ambrose Heights. He cultivates social order and invents concoctions that allow vampires to feel human once again.But Steffan also has a devouring obsession that brings him to his knees. Her name is Anya. Steffan sets out to claim Anya, a mortal ripe for the taking, as his mate. But the blackness in the eyes of his newborn shouldâ€™ve served as a warning. Anya is off-limits according to the vampire creed.It will take the strength of the kinship, the purity of love, a hint of magic, and a subterranean guardian to shield Steffan against the wrath of Ryan Evans, protect him from the fate of the Nemesis, and bridge a passage to his rightful destiny.A Siren Erotic Romance
author: Maya DeLeina
